sentence.text: We present the new observations of postoperative microcystic macular edema (proteolysis) as a mild form of cystoid macular lesions (CMLs) after standard phacoemulsification.To report the incidence, risk factors, and pathophysiology of MME compared to conventional concept of pseudophakic cystoid macular edema (CME), we retrospectively reviewed patients* records.

Pseudophakic proteolysiss were more likely to have a history of diabetic retinopathy, epiretinal membrane, and eyes were not treated with topical NSAID.This study showed a wide clinical spectrum of CMLs.
